task.title: Add a figure
task.shortdesc: A figure is a container part that usually holds a graphic and a title.

context.p: If you need to include some specific information about a graphic, such as a caption or a description, you can add a figure. The graphic is optional, so you can also add a figure simply to group a small amount of content together under a title. For example, you may want to add a title above an example of code block.

step.stepresult: A figure part is inserted, with sub-parts. The Guidance panel displays all the parts.

step.cmd: Use the Guidance panel to add the parts of the figure that you want.
(Optional) Select Insert Image or add another part that you want.
step.info: An image is normally added to a figure but is optional. You could also add a code block or some other chunk of information that needs to be grouped together under a title.
